date.help: Day of the month on which to scan the server (1 - 31).
date.name: date

file-path.help: Path on the server to the fingerprint files (max 119 characters).
file-path.name: file-path

file-pattern.help: Files matching this pattern on the server are fingerprinted. Optionally use the * and ? wildcards.
file-pattern.name: file-pattern

keep-modified.help: Enable so that when a file is changed on the server the FortiGate keeps the old fingerprint and adds a new fingerprint to the database.
keep-modified.name: keep-modified

options.help: Keep the old fingerprint and add a new fingerprint when a file is changed on the server.
options.name: enable

options.help: Replace the old fingerprint with the new fingerprint when a file is changed on the server.
options.name: disable

name.help: Name of the DLP fingerprint database.
name.name: name

password.help: Password required to log into the file server.
password.name: password

period.help: Frequency for which the FortiGate checks the server for new or changed files.
period.name: period

options.help: Check the server when the FortiGate starts up.
options.name: none

options.help: Check the server once a day.
options.name: daily

options.help: Check the server once a week.
options.name: weekly

options.help: Check the server once a month.
options.name: monthly

remove-deleted.help: Enable to keep the fingerprint database up to date when a file is deleted from the server.
remove-deleted.name: remove-deleted

options.help: Keep the fingerprint database up to date when a file is deleted from the server.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not check for deleted files on the server. Saves system resources.
options.name: disable

scan-on-creation.help: Enable to keep the fingerprint database up to date when a file is added or changed on the server.
scan-on-creation.name: scan-on-creation

options.help: Keep the fingerprint database up to date when a file is added or changed on the server.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not check for added or changed files on the server. Saves system resources.
options.name: disable

scan-subdirectories.help: Enable/disable scanning subdirectories to find files to create fingerprints from.
scan-subdirectories.name: scan-subdirectories

options.help: Scan subdirectories.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not scan subdirectories.
options.name: disable

sensitivity.help: Select a sensitivity or threat level for matches with this fingerprint database. Add sensitivities using sensitivity.
sensitivity.name: sensitivity

server.help: IPv4 or IPv6 address of the server.
server.name: server

server-type.help: Protocol used to communicate with the file server. Currently only Samba (SMB) servers are supported.
server-type.name: server-type

options.help: SAMBA server.
options.name: samba

tod-hour.help: Hour of the day on which to scan the server (0 - 23, default = 1).
tod-hour.name: tod-hour

tod-min.help: Minute of the hour on which to scan the server (0 - 59).
tod-min.name: tod-min

username.help: User name required to log into the file server.
username.name: username

vdom.help: Select the VDOM that can communicate with the file server.
vdom.name: vdom

options.help: Communicate with the file server through the management VDOM.
options.name: mgmt

options.help: Communicate with the file server through the VDOM containing this DLP fingerprint database configuration.
options.name: current

weekday.help: Day of the week on which to scan the server.
weekday.name: weekday

options.help: Sunday
options.name: sunday

options.help: Monday
options.name: monday

options.help: Tuesday
options.name: tuesday

options.help: Wednesday
options.name: wednesday

options.help: Thursday
options.name: thursday

options.help: Friday
options.name: friday

options.help: Saturday
options.name: saturday

results.help: Create a DLP fingerprint database by allowing the FortiGate to access a file server containing files from which to create fingerprints.
results.name: fp-doc-source
